name: 2018/10/18 Dinner
description: Indulge in a wholesome and nutritious dinner with this high-protein, low-sodium, and high-fiber meal. Crafted for those pursuing a healthified lifestyle, this recipe combines the savory flavors of chicken and vegetables with a hint of garlic and pesto for a hearty and balanced dish.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat your grill to medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Shuck the corn and remove all silk. Rinse the corn under cold water.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the chicken into bite-sized pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the eggplant and carrots into thin rounds.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Finely chop the red onion and garlic.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix the chicken pieces with half of the chopped garlic and season with salt and pepper to taste.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Grill the corn for about 10 minutes, turning occasionally until cooked through and slightly charred. Remove and set aside to cool.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: In a skillet over medium heat, melt the butter and saut√© the remaining garlic and chopped onion until translucent.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chicken to the skillet and grill until thoroughly cooked, about 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 9

recipeInstructions.text: Add the sliced eggplant and carrot to the grill, cooking until tender, about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 10

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the grilled corn off the cob and add to the skillet with the chicken and vegetables.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 11

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in the pesto to the skillet, mixing well to combine all the ingredients.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 12
